paragraphs.content: The LORD reigneth; let the people tremble: he sitteth between the cherubims; let the earth be moved.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord reigneth; let the people tremble: he sitteth between the cherubims; let the earth be moved.

paragraphs.content: The LORD is great in Zion; and he is high above all the people.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord is great in Zion; and he is high above all the people.

paragraphs.content: Let them praise thy great and terrible name; for it is holy.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let them praise thy great and terrible name; for it is holy.

paragraphs.content: The king’s strength also loveth judgment; thou dost establish equity, thou executest judgment and righteousness in Jacob.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The king’s strength also loveth judgment; thou dost establish equity, thou executest judgment and righteousness in Jacob.

paragraphs.content: Exalt ye the LORD our God, and worship at his footstool; for he is holy.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Exalt ye the Lord our God, and worship at his footstool; for he is holy.

paragraphs.content: Moses and Aaron among his priests, and Samuel among them that call upon his name; they called upon the LORD, and he answered them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Moses and Aaron among his priests, and Samuel among them that call upon his name; they called upon the Lord, and he answered them.

paragraphs.content: He spake unto them in the cloudy pillar: they kept his testimonies, and the ordinance that he gave them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He spake unto them in the cloudy pillar: they kept his testimonies, and the ordinance that he gave them.

paragraphs.content: Thou answeredst them, O LORD our God: thou wast a God that forgavest them, though thou tookest vengeance of their inventions.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou answeredst them, O Lord our God: thou wast a God that forgavest them, though thou tookest vengeance of their inventions.

paragraphs.content: Exalt the LORD our God, and worship at his holy hill; for the LORD our God is holy.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Exalt the Lord our God, and worship at his holy hill; for the Lord our God is holy.
